name: RUNE
description:
This script will install "Rune Gold" GOG edition with support for modern screen resolution.
During install please let all options by default.
Thanks to the people who contributed to play this game in the best conditions.
notes:
- Rune Gold has bad controller support. Instead I invite you to use a keymapper like Antimicro or sc-controller. You will find profiles for x360 and Steam Controller in the "gamepad profiles" folder.
- Please report issue concerning this script on my github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

files.setup: N/A:Select the EXE downloaded from GOG

execute.command: cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Rune Gold"; rm -f -r System/User.ini Gameux* gog* Launch* Support* unins*;

content:
custom-name: RUNE Gold - GOG
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the EXE downloaded from GOG
- gppreadme: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Rune/gamepad%20profiles/rune_gamepad_readme.html
- gppx360: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Rune/gamepad%20profiles/rune_x360.gamecontroller.amgp
- gppsteam: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Rune/gamepad%20profiles/rune_steam.sccprofile
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Rune Gold/System/Rune.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SILENT /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    description: Installing...
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- write_config:
    data:
      Engine.GameEngine:
        ServerActors: IpServer.UdpServerUplink MasterServerAddress=master.333networks.com
          MasterServerPort=27900
      FirstRun:
        FirstRun: 107
      IpServer.UdpServerUplink:
        MasterServerAddress: master.333networks.com
      UBrowserAll:
        ListFactories[0]: UBrowser.UBrowserGSpyFact,MasterServerAddress=master.333networks.com,MasterServerTCPPort=28900,ServerRegion=0,GameName=rune
      WinDrv.WindowsClient:
        FullscreenColorBits: 32
        FullscreenViewportX: $RESOLUTION_WIDTH
        FullscreenViewportY: $RESOLUTION_HEIGHT
        UseDirectDraw: true
        UseJoystick: false
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Rune Gold/System/Default.ini
    merge: true
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Rune Gold/System/Rune.ini
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Rune Gold/System/Default.ini
- input_menu:
    description: 'Please choose your screen ratio:'
    id: fov
    options:
    - 91: 16/9
    - 85: 16/10
    - autre: other or do not know
    preselect: 91
- write_config:
    data:
      Engine.Input:
        B: Look
        H: TurnLeft
        J: TurnRight
        MouseWheelUp: null
        Shift: null
        V: ZTargetToggle
      Engine.PlayerPawn:
        DefaultFOV: $INPUT_fov.000000
        DesiredFOV: $INPUT_fov.000000
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Rune Gold/System/DefUser.ini
    merge: true
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Rune Gold/gamepad profiles/
    src: gppx360
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Rune Gold/gamepad profiles/
    src: gppsteam
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Rune Gold/gamepad profiles/
    src: gppreadme
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: csmt
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct3D\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '00000000'
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: EAXEnabled
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DirectSound
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: Y
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: background
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
- execute:
    command: cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Rune Gold"; rm -f -r System/User.ini Gameux*
      gog* Launch* Support* unins*;
system:
  use_us_layout: true
